V8100_data Struct Reference

V8100 board data structure. More...

#include <V8100.h>


Data Fields

board_data m_common_data

Detailed Description

V8100 board data structure.

This structure stores any board data, common and specific ones. It must be passed to each V8100's API

Definition at line 46 of file V8100.h.

Field Documentation

board_data V8100_data::m_common_data

Boards common data structure: always let at offset 0
